Trade/Device Name(s): Dimension Vista™M Carbon Dioxide (CO2) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Creatinine (CREA) Flex® reagent cartridge
Dimension Vista™M Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) Flex® reagent cartridge
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Dade Behring Dimension Vista™M CO2, CREA, and LDH reagent cartridges for in vitro quantitative measurement of CO2, creatinine, and LDH on the Dimension Vista™M system.
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of carbon dioxide (in serum/plasma, for acid-base balance disorders), creatinine (in serum/plasma/urine, for renal disease diagnosis/treatment/dialysis monitoring), and lactate dehydrogenase activity (in serum/plasma, for diagnosis/treatment of liver, cardiac, and lung/kidney tumors).
